text: Marin Grujević (born 9 March 1994) is a Croatian professional footballer who plays as a right back for NK Istra 1961 in the Croatian First Football League.Profile at NK Istra 1961 official website ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Rijeka Category:Croatian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:HNK Rijeka players Category:NK Grobničan players Category:NK Pomorac 1921 players Category:NK Novigrad players Category:NK Istra 1961 players Category:NK Rudeš players Category:Croatian First Football League players
title: Marin Grujević
